title: Love, Greater Than Infinity
description: Teddy Mulligan is a keeper who never intended to fall in love with Gracie Harris. In a Universe in which all events are predetermined, keepers must honor the mandates of the Dimension Council and assist in the fulfillment of their assignments’ Destinies. For this reason, Teddy must suppress his forbidden feelings or else risk losing his post as Gracie’s keeper. But when Teddy discovers that Gracie’s Destiny includes marrying Mr. Wrong, Teddy is forced to make a fateful choice: remain loyal to his keeper oath or intervene to change Gracie’s Destiny forever. LOVE, GREATER THAN INFINITY is Book #1 in this funny, refreshing romance fantasy series about the fateful foibles of altering our destinies, the comic consequences of eternal love, and how sometimes our soul mates are closer to us than we can ever know.
author: Cora Avondale
